TEXT.TITLE: CAMPEAU AND EDWARD DEBARTOLO COMPLETE PURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: <Campeau Corp> and the <Edward J. DeBartolo Corp> have closed on their previously-announced purchase of five of the regional shopping centers of Allied Stores Corp. Campeau said it and the DeBartolo Association will each hold a 50 pct ownership interest in the shopping centers. Campeau separately announced that, as required by a bank agreement, it has contributed an additional 50 mln dlrs of capital to Allied. Campeau acquired Allied Stores Corp earlier this year, the company said. Reuter
